data.title: METRO MIRROR
data.text:
MUMBAI:MMNN:20 Feb 2024

Yami Gautam and Aditya Dhar are eagerly anticipating the release of their upcoming action thriller, "Article 370," which delves into the abrogation of Article 370 in Jammu and Kashmir. Recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi mentioned the film during a rally, expressing his belief that it would provide valuable insight into the subject matter.

In response to PM Modi's comments, Yami and Aditya took to Instagram, expressing their gratitude for his acknowledgment. They shared a collaborative post, describing it as an "absolute honour" to hear the Prime Minister discuss their film. Yami wrote, "It is an absolute honour to watch PM@narendramodi Ji talk about #Article370Movie. My team and I really hope that we all exceed your expectations in bringing this incredible story to the screen!"

Adding to the excitement surrounding the film, Yami and Aditya also announced at the trailer launch event that they are expecting their first child together. The couple, who first met during the filming of "URI," tied the knot in 2021 and are thrilled to embark on this new chapter of their lives.

"Article 370," produced by Jyoti Deshpande, Aditya Dhar, and Lokesh Dhar, and directed by Aditya Suhas Jambhale, marks the second collaboration between Yami and Aditya after the success of "URI." Scheduled for theatrical release on February 23rd, 2024, the film promises to offer audiences a gripping portrayal of the events surrounding the abrogation of Article 370 in Jammu and Kashmir.

MUMBAI:MMNN:10 Feb 2024

With Bollywood romantic films, where love often defies conventional boundaries, 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' emerges as a unique tale nestled in the enigmatic landscapes of Artificial Intelligence. Directed by the talented duo Amit Joshi and Aradhana Sah, this film delves into the intricacies of an improbable romance between man and machine, portrayed by the charismatic duo of Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon.

Released in the Valentine's Week, the film embarked on its cinematic journey on February 9, captivating audiences with its refreshing narrative. As the first-day box office numbers trickle in, it's evident that 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' has garnered a decent start, promising an intriguing journey ahead.

According to early estimates by industry trackers, the film amassed approximately â¹6.5 crore nett on its opening day in India. While this figures howcases a promising beginning, it's worth noting the subtle nuances of audience engagement reflected in the occupancy rates.

With an overall 14.92 percent occupancy in Hindi circuits, the film witnessed varying degrees of interest throughout the day. Morning shows kicked off with 8.8 per cent occupancy, gradually escalating to 25.46 per cent during the night screenings, signifying a growing trend as the day unfolded.

At its core, 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' intricately weaves together the threads of love, technology, and human emotions. Shahid Kapoor portrays the role of a brilliant scientist immersed in the realm of robotics. Kriti Sanon is depicted as a robot playing Shahid's love interest in the film.

MUMBAI:MMNN:12 May 2023

Allu Arjun is one of the biggest names in the Telugu film industry. After the release of Pushpa: The Rise â Part 1, he has become a pan-India star, and now, everyone is waiting for Pushap 2: The Rule. There have been multiple reports about his next film after Pushpa 2, and now, a recent report suggests that he is in talks with the makers of The Immortal Ashwatthama to play the lead role.

The Immortal Ashwatthama will be directed by Aditay Dhar and earlier it was announced with Vicky Kaushal in the lead role. However, there have been reports of his exit from the film, and there was also a buzz that the movie will star Ranveer Singh.

this report of Allu Arjun being in talks about the makers of the film, has made his fans super excited. A netizen tweeted, âHe should do it. Trivikram can wait. It is my intuition but i think Dhar with this film can give AA a bigger blockbuster than Trivikram can.â Another Twitter user wrote, âmake it happen @alluarjun anna.â One more netizen tweeted, âThis is the brand AA everyone wants to work with him.

MUMBAI:MMNN:11 May 2023

Urvashi Rautela often makes headlines for multiple reasons and today, she is in the news as it looks like she has bagged her first Dharma movie. She took to social media and shared a glimpse of a sweet hamper she received from Karan Johar and captioned it, âNew beginnings

Urvashi is back in the news as she has bagged her first Dharma film and while there's that, she's also gearing up for her Hollywood debut where she will co-star 365 fame actor Michelle Morrone. She also has a movie with Pothineni, Sampath Nandiâs Black Rose and a project with Randeep Hooda. The actress also has collabroated for a music single with Jason Derulo Last seen with Akhil Akkineni in Agent, the Surender Reddy directorial failed to work at the box office and as a result, one of the producers Anil sunkara, took the blame for the same. The movie hit the screens on April 28, 2023. Taking to Twitter, he wrote, âWe have to take the entire blame for #Agent. Though we know its an uphill task, we thought of conquering but failed to do so as we did a blunder starting the project without a bound script & innumerable issues including covid followed. We donât want to give any excuses but learn from this costly mistake and see how we can turn around to make sure, we will never repeat the mistakes. Our sincere apologies to all those who put trust on us. We will make it up for the losses with dedicated planning & hard work in our future projects."

MUMBAI:MMNN:8 May 2023

The Kerala Story starring Adah Sharma has surprised one and all. The film, which was released on Friday, has received mixed reviews. But, it has taken the box office by storm.

The movie on its first day collected Rs. 8.03 crore which was very good, but because of the positive word of mouth and the buzz on social media, The Kerala Story went on to show a fantastic growth over the weekend.

On Saturday and Sunday, the movie collected Rs. 11.22 crore and Rs. 16 crore respectively, taking the first weekend total to Rs. 35.25 crore which is excellent. After such a great weekend, we can expect the film to be stable on weekdays as well. It looks like in its first week, the movie will cross Rs. 50 crore easily.

The Kerala Story has no star power and the makers didnât promote it heavily. It is clearly riding on the word of mouth and the buzz on social media.

Talking about Ponniyin Selvan 2, the film did show a minor jump on its second weekend, but couldnât reach a double digit number on any day. The film in 10 days has collected Rs. 152.50 crore which is decent, but not great. The first instalment of the movie had done much better than the sequel.

MUMBAI:MMNN:7 May 2023

Filmmaker Ayan Mukerjiâs directorial venture Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani has garnered immense love and appreciation from fans. The movie is considered to be one of the iconic films. Given the fact, the movie has received so much love, fans wonder if there will be a sequel. Well, going by his recent chat, Ranbir Kapoor dropped a major hint on the Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani sequel. Recently, in a virtual chat, on being asked which film of him aka Bunny would want a sequel, except Brahmastra, he said that the film âwould make a good sequelâ.

TTalking more about the details, the Shamshera actor further revealed, âAyan also had a very nice story I remember. Then he went into this Brahmastra journey. But, never say never. He might make it after a couple of years,â he said.

Ranbir said that the story should be set 10 years ahead and how the characters are living in the current life. âI think the story will be 10 years forward where Bunny, Naina, Avi and Aditi, where are in their lives. I think itâll be quite interesting and nice to explore those characters,â the Brahmastra actor said.

Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone starrer Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani was not just a movie but an emotion. From deep life lessons to relationships between friends and family, fans were relating to YJHD on many levels. And Ranbirâs recent statement can leave fans with tears of joy; however, weâll wait for an official statement on the same.

Helmed by Ayan Mukerji, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani also starred Kalki Koechlin, Aditya Roy Kapur and Kunal Roy Kapur. Currently, Kapoor is gearing up for another sequel and that is Brahmastra. Part 2: Dev was announced to release in December 2026 whereas the final part will release in December 2027. He is also gearing up for the release of Animal with Rashmika Mandanna.

New Delhi:MMNN:2 May 2023

Actor Parineeti Chopra and AAP leader Raghav Chadha will finally announce their engagement on May 13 in New Delhi. The couple could be seen leaving a restaurant together in the pictures and videos that the paparazzi posted. Parineeti stopped to pose for the photographers and chatted briefly with them before getting into the same car, whereas Raghav went straight out to his car.

Parineeti and Raghav will make their relationship official with an intimate engagement in New Delhi on May 13 reports Indian Express.com. The duo havenât responded to the report yet. Sanjeev Arora, the head of the AAP, had earlier congratulated them on their union. Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha were seen together at a lunch date in Mumbai last month, which sparked dating rumours. The âUunchaiâ actress blushed when prompted about her wedding with the AAP leader.

Raghav Chadha finally addressed the rumours of their affair last month when questioned regarding the actress. He said, âAap mujhse raajneeti ke sawaal kariye, Parineeti ke sawaal na kariye (Please ask me questions on politics, not Parineeti).â When questioned further regarding the rumours surrounding their relationship, Raghav blushed and responded, âDenge jawaab.â

New Delhi:MMNN:2 may 2023

Mani Ratnamâs epic, PS-2 is on a roll at the Box Office worldwide and has crossed the winning mark of Rs 200 crore already. The film which was released last Friday is unstoppable at the ticket window and has been earning in double digits even during weekdays. The Chiyaan Vikram and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan starrer grossed around Rs 173 crore in its first weekend after which it didnât slow down and reached Rs 200 crore in a matter of four days. The film has also crossed Rs 100 crore nett in India in four days and has become the third Tamil movie of the year to do so.

It took Ponniyin Selvan-2 four days to make a double century at Box Office while Ponniyin Selvan-1 reached the amazing benchmark worldwide in just three days.

Ponniyin Selvan-2 is now on its way to crossing Rs 400 crore and it shall even go over this in its lifetime run. The second part of the Mani Ratnam directorial has received better reviews than the first one and that will definitely add to the moolah. With the help of good reviews, the credibility of a master filmmaker, and a celebrated star cast, Ponniyin Selvan-2 is on its way to becoming one of the most successful historic dramas in the country. The film has a good window to perform until another biggie hits the screens which is not happening anytime soon. PS-2 is making waves on the big screen and it has emerged as yet another winner from South India.

New Delhi:MMNN:26 April 2023

Filmfare Awards 2023: Like every year, fans are eagerly waiting for the Filmfare Awards 2023. The Filmfare Awards are being held on April 27, 2023 at the Jio World Convention Center in Mumbai.

This award night will see a gathering of all the artists from the entertainment world. Several awards have been announced in technical and non-technical categories with nominations in 19 main categories.

This year, Salman Khan will host the award night and will be joined by stars like Ayushmann Khurrana, Manish Paul. Vicky Kaushal, Tiger Shroff, Govinda to Janhvi Kapoor will add color to the program with their performances on this award night.

This glamorous award night will be telecast on Colors channel on 28 April 2023 at 9 PM. Apart from this, you will also be able to see updates related to the event on Filmfare's website and social media handles. If you want to be a part of this award show, you can buy tickets from the official website. The award night has been organized on 27th April and the show will be aired on the next day i.e. 28th.

Best Director

Anees Bajmi (Bhool Bhulaiya 2), Ayan Mukerji (Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Harshvardhan Kulkarni (Badhai Do), Sanjay Leela Bhansali (Gangubai Kathiawadi), Sooraj R. Barjatya (Height), Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri (Kashmir Files).

Best Film Critic

'Badhai Do' (Harshvardhan Kulkarni), 'Bhedia' (Amar Kaushik), 'Jund' (Nagraj Poptrao Manjule), 'Rocketry: Nambi Prabhav' (R Madhavan), 'Vadh' (Jaspal Singh Sandhu and Rajeev Baranwal),

Best Actor in a Leading Role Male

Ajay Devgn (Drishyam 2), Amitabh Bachchan (Unchai), Anupam Kher (The Kashmir Files), Hrithik Roshan (Vikram Vedha), Karthik Aaryan (Bhool Bhulaiya 2), Rajkumar Rao (Bhadhai Do)

Best Actor Critic

Amitabh Bachchan (Swarm), R Madhavan (Rocketry: The Numby Effect), Rajkumar Rao (Congratulations), Sanjay Mishra (Slaughter), Shahid Kapoor (Jersey), Varun Dhawan (Wolf), Best Actor in a Leading Role (Female), Alia Bhatt (Gangubai Kathiawadi), Bhumi Pednekar (Badhai Do), Janhvi Kapoor (Millie), Kareena Kapoor Khan (Lal Singh Chadha), Tabu (Bhool Bhulaiya 2).

Best Actress Critic

Bhumi Pednekar (Badhai Do), Kajol (Salam Venki), Neena Gupta (Vadh), Taapsee Pannu (Shabaash Mithu), Tabu (Bhool Bhulaiya 2)

Best Actor in a Supporting Role Male

Anil Kapoor (Jugjag Jio), Anupam Kher (Height), Darshan Kumar (Kashmir Files), Gulshan Devaiah (Congratulations Do), Jaideep Ahlawat (Action Hero), Manish Paul (Jugjag Jio), Mithun Chakraborty (Kashmir Files)

Supporting Role Best Actress Female

Mouni Roy (Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Neetu Kapoor (Jugjag Jio), Sheeba Chadha (Badhai Do), Sheeba Chadha (Doctor Ji), Shefali Shah (Doctor Ji), Simran (Rocketry: Nambi Prabhav) ,

Best Music Album

Amit Trivedi (Height), Pritam (Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Pritam (Lal Singh Chadha), Sachin Jigar (Bhedia), Sanjay Leela Bhansali (Gangubai Kathiawadi)

Best music

AM Turaj (Jab Saiyan- Gangubai Kathiawadi), Amitabh Bhattacharya (Apna Bana Le Piya- Bheldia), Amitabh Bhattacharya (Kesaria-Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Amitabh Bhattacharya (Tere Hawala- Lal Singh Chadha), Shaili (Maiya Mainu- jersey)

Best Playback Singer Male

Abhay Jodhpurkar (Mange Manzooriyaan- Badhai Do), Arijit Singh (Apna Bana Le-Bhedia), Arijit Singh (Deva Deva- Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Arijit Singh (Kesaria-Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Sonu Nigam (Main Ki Reason- Lal Singh Chadha),

Best Playback Singer Philmel

Janhvi Srimankar (Dholida-Gangubai Kathiawadi), Jonita Gandhi (Dev Dev- Brahmastra Part One: Shiva), Kavita Seth (Rangsari- Jugjag Jiyo), Shilpa Rao (Tere Hawale- Lal Singh Chadha), Shreya Ghoshal (Jab Saiyan- Gangubai Kathiawadi) )

Best Debut Director

Anirudh Iyer (An Action Hero), Anubhuti Kashyap (Doctor G), Jai Basantu Singh (Released in Public Interest), Jaspal Singh Sandhu and Rajeev Baranwal (Vadh), R Madhavan (Rocketry: The Numby Effect)

Best debut mail

Abhay Mishra (Doctor G), Ankush Gedam (Jund), Palin Kabak (Bhedia), Shantanu Maheshwari (Gangubai Kathiawadi)

Best Debut Female

Andrea Kevichusa (Many), Khushali Kumar (Dhokha: Round D Corner), Manushi Chhillar (Samrat Prithviraj), Prajakta Koli (Jugjag Jio)

New Delhi:MMNN:24 April 2023

Salman Khan's highly anticipated family drama movie "Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan" has performed well at the box office, earning a total of Rs 68.17 crore in its opening weekend, according to the film's makers on Monday. The movie, directed by Farhad Samji, hit theaters on Friday, April 21, ahead of Eid, and marks Salman Khan's first big-screen release in a leading role in four years.

New Delhi:MMNN:20 April 2023

If you expect one thing from a new Fast & Furious trailer, make it FAMILY. Another? Physics mown down in a blaze of speeding car tires or exploding motors. Vin Diesel growling something. A giant threat to our heroes that can only be faced in demolition derby fashion and, yes, FAMILY again. The new look at Fast X has screeched in

Having fought off worries about franchise fatigue (Fast 9 didnât hit at the box office quite as well as some of its predecessors) and behind-the-scenes drama (veteran director Justin Lin departed the movie after 10 days of shooting), Fast X is being described as the beginning of the end of the road, since the 11th main movie is the big finale for the franchise. Assuming you believe thatâ¦

So what's the story this time? Official synopsis time!

Over many missions and against impossible odds, Dom Toretto (Diesel) and his family have outsmarted, out-nerved and outdriven every foe in their path. Now, they confront the most lethal opponent theyâve ever faced: A terrifying threat emerging from the shadows of the past whoâs fueled by blood revenge, and who is determined to shatter this family and destroy everything â and everyone â that Dom loves, forever.

In 2011âs Fast & Furious 5: Rio Heist, Dom and his crew took out nefarious Brazilian drug kingpin Hernan Reyes and decapitated his empire on a bridge in Rio De Janeiro. What they didnât know was that Reyesâ son, Dante (Jason Momoa), witnessed it all and has spent the last 12 years masterminding a plan to make Dom pay the ultimate price.

Danteâs plot will scatter Domâs family from Los Angeles to the catacombs of Rome, from Brazil to London and from Portugal to Antarctica. New allies will be forged, and old enemies will resurface. But everything changes when Dom discovers that his own 8-year-old son Brian (Leo Abelo Perry) is the ultimate target of Danteâs vengeance.

The regulars are joined by the likes of Brie Larson, Daniela Melchior, Alan Ritchson and Rita Moreno, and Universal are clearly happy with the job that incoming director Louis Leterrier was able to achieve, as he's returning for the next one.

Fast X is due in cinemas on 19 May. FAMILY.

Avinash Tripathi honored with Maharashtra Dream Achievers Award

NEW DELHI:MMNN: 19 April 2023
